amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute consists of the text of the Omnibus National Parks and Public Lands Act of 1998.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to revise or eliminate various provisions relating to consultations with affected state governors on presidentially declared national monuments; and conveyance and exchange of lands in various states by the Interior and Agriculture Departments.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Hansen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hansen amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
